name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 38: The Real Racing: Toyota
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol.38 - The Real Racing - Toyota is a racing game that features different Toyotas car models that can be drive in different Japanese circuits and in different time (noon, evening, night, etc) and weather conditions (sunny, cloudy, rain or misty). The game features also different game modes (championship, free race), a 2 players split screen vs mode and different camera angles.
